attributes.action: End now and never allow again, positive discrimination!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is almost unthinkable that the government is actually considering allowing positive discrimination, or as the citizens like to call it, negative discrimination.  Not only does it already happen anyway (proof provided if required), but to be endorsed by government ministers is a complete insult to those that kept this party in power.  End it now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
